Entropic Blow.name: Entropic Blow
Entropic Blow.flavor: You swing with a devastating strike that leaves you and the enemies around you open to attack.
Entropic Blow.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you and each enemy adjacent to you takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.

Strike of Unmaking.name: Strike of Unmaking
Strike of Unmaking.flavor: Your attack puts your foe on the path to destruction.
Strike of Unmaking.trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee attack
Strike of Unmaking.effect: The target loses all resistances until the end of your next turn.

Arm of Dissolution.name: Arm of Dissolution
Arm of Dissolution.flavor: Your attack resounds with a chord of dissolution, and your foe crumbles under the power of entropy.
Arm of Dissolution.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends). Each time the target takes the ongoing damage, you gain a +1 power bonus to melee attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Arm of Dissolution.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends). You gain no power bonus from the ongoing damage.
